show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, www.naturalnurse.com , Facebook The Natural Nurse, interviews Swami Narayan Tirtha , also… known as Cowboy Swami Shaman.
Swami become a monk in 1990, and spends a portion of each year serving indigenous communities in the Himalayan and Andes Mountain regions of the world.
He is the author of the Ayurveda Encyclopedia (2nd ed.
20,000 copies in print) and the Bhagavad Gita for Modern Times, and his newest book, 21 Days to Freedom.
He founded an ashram (monastery),and has spoken at the White House Commission on Complimentary and Alternative Medicine, John Hopkins University, other universities and various radio shows.
He is on the board of advisors of ‘Light on Ayurveda Journal’ and has accepted the lead role as ‘Ayurveda Expert’for altMD.com –whose vision is to bring unity to the CAM community.
Swamiji has been recognized as a swami and also a shaman.
He offers readings to help people understand their life transformation, health, & life purpose as we head into the new age.
He is the founder of the School of Ayurveda, offering ayurveda certification programs, and has an Ayurveda herbal product line.
Contact: www.peaceandparadise.com
